page.title: Apple Time Capsule A1470 (2 TB, ME177LL/A)

[http://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/AirPort+Time+Capsule+A1470+%28Mini!%29+Teardown/15067/1 Teardown on '''iFixit'''] The FCC test report indicates the firmware used during testing was 6.10.56.166. :''Transmit beam forming is supported on 802.11n/ac''
